results.title: Ellie Deacon's backpack with contents
results.credit_line: Courtesy Made Up Stories, Arenamedia, Pick Up Truck Pictures
results.brief_description:
Contents include: red cap, white sneakers, black bra, 2 x pairs of white socks, black and white floral briefs, blue denim shorts, navy blue hooded raincoat, white t-shirt with black edging, pale pink tshirt
Note: zipper of front pocket is broken

results.title: Devil on Wheels cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. A large piece of cream tape has been adhered to the bottom of the slide to cover some cinema session times. This hand coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Devils on Wheels’ featuring Ann Sheridan, Pat O’ Brien and John Payne by Warner Bros.
results.description: Glass cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. A large piece of cream tape has been adhered to the bottom of the slide to cover some cinema session times. This hand coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Devils on Wheels’ featuring Ann Sheridan, Pat O’ Brien and John Payne by Warner Bros.
description_for_label: Glass cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. A large piece of cream tape has been adhered to the bottom of the slide to cover some cinema session times. This hand coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Devils on Wheels’ featuring Ann Sheridan, Pat O’ Brien and John Payne by Warner Bros.

group_siblings.title: A Bill of Divorcement cinema slide
group_siblings.creator_credit: RKO Radio Pictures and George Cukor
group_siblings.credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.

results.title: Don't Think I Don't Think
results.brief_description: Documents an important conference on rights for the disabled held at Melbourne University in 1981. The disabled groups present drew up a charter of rights- rights to work, to live in their own houses etc. free of the constraints that paternalistic institutions impose
